channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- JoomSport – for Sports: Team & League, Football, Hockey & more
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- JoomSport – for Sports: Team & League, Football, Hockey & more

item.title: CVE-2021-24384|2024-08-03T19:28:23.922Z -- unknown -- joomsport%20%E2%80%93%20for%20sports%3A%20team%20%26%20league%2C%20football%2C%20hockey%20%26%20more
item.description: The joomsport_md_load AJAX action of the JoomSport WordPress plugin before 5.1.8, registered for both unauthenticated and unauthenticated users, unserialised user input from the shattr POST parameter, leading to a PHP Object Injection issue. Even though the plugin does not have a suitable gadget chain to exploit this, other installed plugins could, which might lead to more severe issues such as RCE
